thread.title: Terrorist With Machete Attacks Soldier At Louvre Museum, Trump Immediately Tweets Challenge To U.S.
thread.title_full: Terrorist With Machete Attacks Soldier At Louvre Museum, Trump Immediately Tweets Challenge To U.S.

author: Andrew Mark Miller
title: Terrorist With Machete Attacks Soldier At Louvre Museum, Trump Immediately Tweets Challenge To U.S.
text:
Yet again, France has been hit by a terrorist attack. 
Luckily, minor injuries to a soldier ended up being the only casualty besides the terrorist who doesn’t count. 
Here’s some more about what happened. 
From Fox News : 
A machete-wielding man shouting “Allahu akbar” three times attacked four French soldiers Friday inside a shopping mall beneath the Louvre Museum in Paris before one soldier shot him, investigators said. 
The attacker had two machetes and was carrying two backpacks — but there was no sign the bags held explosives, a police union official said. He told reporters the man launched himself at the soldiers when they told him that he couldn’t bring his bags into the Carrousel du Louvre shopping mall underneath the world-famous museum where the “Mona Lisa” hangs. 
Scary stuff. 
President Trump didn’t waste any time letting the world know what he thought about it. A new radical Islamic terrorist has just attacked in Louvre Museum in Paris. Tourists were locked down. France on edge again. GET SMART U.S. 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) February 3, 2017 
Can’t argue with that. 
This Trump guy never sleeps. I love it. 
France doesn’t really seem to be taking this whole terrorism thing seriously. 
Looks like Le Pen is their only shot to grab this thing by the horns. LIKE this article?
